name: Chocolate Chili Pretzels
preparation: Melt dark Belgian chocolate in mixing bowl over hot water, stirring frequently until melted.
Stir in chipotle chili and oil.
Dip pretzels, one at a time, into chocolate mixture.
Place on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner.
Before chocolate cools completely, sprinkle lightly with decorating sugar.
tips: 1 tsp of chipotle chili has more antioxidants than 1⁄2 cup chopped red pepper.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
